game.name: 勇者联盟星耀传说
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: There are forty characters that can join the player's team, choose your favorite teammates, and constantly defeat the monsters. This is the best way to become a star-level brave. Players can travel the continent of Elon by train. I hope that every player can find their own "script" in the game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: There are forty characters that can join the player's team, choose your favorite teammates, and constantly defeat the monsters. This is the best way to become a star-level brave. Players can travel the continent of Elon by train. I hope that every player can find their own "script" in the game.
